channel.title: Help Please. Don't just ignore this if you could help
channel.description:
I've edited this since i have the stuff i needed, Now i have Java 6.0 AND Java 6.0 Update 1. I'm not sure which Java my computer is using atm because i've redone it so many times. If someone could show me pics of [u][b]EXACTLY[/b][/u] how its suppose to look , that'll be really great. Also i just tested the specs on my server and it goes like this...
Hit .. Pause ...Hit .. Pause .. Hit ..Spec ...Hit (Once)
thats with a dragon hally or a drag dagger, as im hitting normally i press spec and when i do no matter when i last attacked it specs but [u][b]NO[/b][/u] damage is done atall. not even the hit splash's come up, and then i hit agian as normal. Can anyone know how to fix it?
P.S. Also i would like to add, I've been hearing alot about Mod Taharoks 'Perfect Compiler' , How do i get that?

item.title: Help Please. Don't just ignore this if you could help
item.dc:creator: @X_Val_X X Val X
item.description:
@X_Val_X wrote:

Thanks guys, i’m downloading Java 6.0 at this moment, Can someone tell me how to get anti-mass so you cant click fast, and how to adjust the speed of wepeons. Thanks [br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2007, 12:41:54 AM[/size][hr]Can someone post that link about how to install your java, i forgot where it is[br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2007, 09:13:55 AM[/size][hr]i’ve installed 6.0 but it says "The system cannot find the path specified, press any key to continue. . . . " . This is getting really annoying, anyone help?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2007, 09:21:19 AM[/size][hr]anyone please :([br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2007, 10:04:29 AM[/size][hr]Ignore the recent posts, they were to help me get Java.

Val[br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2007, 10:23:13 AM[/size][hr]Still saying the same thing… :|[br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2007, 11:05:35 AM[/size][hr]Ive used Mod Taharoks Perfect Compiler, and got this error

[CODE]GraphicsHandler.java:44: cannot find symbol
symbol : method specspell<int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int>
location: class client
person.specspell<castId, casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, angle, speed, startHeigh, endHeight, enemyY, enemyX, MageAttackIndex>;}
^

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: recompile with -XLint:deprecation for deatils.
1 error
Files compiled successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .[/CODE]

Well there you have it.
[br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2007, 11:36:18 AM[/size][hr]any one got any ideas?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 17, 2007, 11:59:12 AM[/size][hr]Help please, soz for the big long list of posts but i really need help
[center] Please do not double post/bump/spam - the ‘Modify’ function exists for a reason - 3 days[/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please. Don't just ignore this if you could help
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:9, topic:95578”]Step 2:
[i]Ok, now look for the variable named path in the list that is shown. Rename it PATH and then replace its variable value with this:[i]

c:\Windows\System32\;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\

Jdk6u1 is a update, you must have JDK 6 to run the update, the adress there is jdk1.6.0_01
wich you cant have if you just have jdk6u1.

Read full topic
item.source: Help Please. Don't just ignore this if you could help

item.title: Help Please. Don't just ignore this if you could help
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

I’ll go ahead and post my tut for JDK 6u1.

Step 1:
[i]Ok, first we have to set the variables. Click on your Start Menu, then Control Panel, then System, then Advances, And finally Environmental Variables.

So, in short:
Start Menu – Control Panel – System – Advanced – Environmental Variables.[/i]

Step 2:
[i]Ok, now look for the variable named “path” in the list that is shown. Rename it “PATH” and then replace its variable value with this:[i]

c:\Windows\System32\;”C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\

Step 3:
Now make a new variable and name it “classpath.” Add this for its value:

C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\

Ok, now that you have your variables set, we need to edit the runserver.bat and compile.bat.

Step 4:
[i]Ok, right-click on your compile.bat and click edit. Now replace everything in it with this:[i]

@echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

Step 5:
[i]Ok, now right-click on you runserver.bat and click edit. Now replace everything in it with this:[i]

@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

You are finished

This looks like Mod Taharok’s Tutorial, but it is edited to work with JDK 6u1.

Read full topic
